description: Example verification rules for domain security checks

recommendations.no_dmarc: Add a DMARC record for email authentication and reporting

recommendations.invalid_ssl: SSL certificate is invalid or expired
recommendations.single_nameserver: Consider using at least 2 nameservers for redundancy
